did.head: Collection Summary

accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Tool Book, Arizona Canal Company (AZ 172). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of Clay Lockett, 1963.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Tool rental company; leasing tools for canal construction in the Phoenix, Ariz. area.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph record book; lists tools received and delivered, by whom and where used.
